verbose_text: At 10 and 20 weeks, losartan and amlodipine significantly decreased gp91 phox and increased SOD in the brains of SHRSP while substantially suppressing apoptosis, suggesting a potential connection of decreased oxidative stress to decreased apoptosis by treatment.
evidence: losartan and amlodipine significantly decreased gp91 phox  and increased SOD in the brains of SHRSP while substantially suppressing apoptosis
